content.description: depending on your style the crux is either the very thin start (no friggin feet!) or the pumpy but very juggy top.  either way its sure to put a smile on your face.
content.location: if you have the book you'll need to change the number from 200a to 197a.  this route is on the pillarish formation of vietnam between saigon sheraton and flash back.  as of 2008 there is 10+ chalked at the bottom of route indicating its start.

content.description: Attention grabbing 5.11 bottom, no hands, cool steep section then bouldery finish on vert.

Super line just to the right of Bikini Wax (2 routes over from Bikini Girls).

Pussy Control involves lots of excellent 2-fingering and 3-fingering that will leave you out of breath if you work it.

Some claim it is dirty, but I like it!

Sneaky moves lead up to a stopper crux on this line.  Get ready for a big toss from sweet holds to a not so sweet hold.  A few more attention getting moves lead to a fun run-out to the chains.

The most obvious moves up the scoop seemed to be off to the side of the bolts adding some pucker factor, and stop the presses!  I found an alternate to the obvious big toss at the crux!  So pick your poison.  The grade is probably solid for the toss, and maybe a bit soft for the sneak around the toss.  Either way its a great ride.
content.protection: 5 bolts to 2 bolt anchor w/ rings.
content.location: Located on the left side of the Vietnam Wall, two routes to the left of Bikini Girls.  Climbs obvious scoop to bulge.  Starts w/ shoulder height ledge w/ jugs and low 1st bolt.

content.description: Located in the Vietnam Sector of Mondo this route is just left of the corner starting with a bit of 5.11, then up a steep wall on beautiful pockets.
Thin delicate moves right off the ground to somewhat steeper rock above.  Has a reachy move or two.  Not quite as good as some of the other routes on the wall.
content.location: Right of Pussy Control and left Stop Talkin'

content.description:
I've never seen anyone on this, but it's worth a spin if you've already ticked the classic .11s at Vietnam. Starts with a bouldery sequence underclinging and laybacking around a small roof with minimal feet. Continue up strenuous sidepulls on the right-hand seam, with some edges and pockets here and there. Bust left to a juggy flake and the anchors.

The first bolt is spinning and not high enough off the deck to do much to protect the crux roof...stick-clipping the second is advisable!

The anchor consists of one open shut and a hanger without links or rings...could use some renovation.
content.protection: 5 bolts to single open shut and hanger.

content.description:
A very tricky 2-move boulder problem that then merges with Bikini Girls.

Hard start, and a bit sharp...
content.location: Just right of Bikini Girls, shares the same anchor

content.description:
Sick climb!

Easy start in the crack quickly turns into 2-finger pocket pulling for a short crux then eases up.

Classic
content.location: Between Napalm Crack and B. Wax

content.description:
1st pitch:  the crux was starting off.  kinda thin and weird body position.  turns into a techy slab up to a ledge.  then jugs out the roof to another slab section, this one being way easier.

didnt do 2nd pitch (1st pitch just not that great to wanna continue, too many highly rated climbs in area)
content.protection: 1st pitch is 9 bolts and the 2nd is 11.
content.location: this route is located right of hanoi hilton on the wall coming off the end of vietnam. just right of the too dirty to climb crack and just left of the unbolted black slab.
